channel.title: I need help with an error
channel.description:
what do i do about this error : client.java:12273:illegal start of expression public void frombank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
can some1 help me with it?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 05:49:14 PM[/size][hr]nvm i fixed it now i have an other error......its :
starting narbscape server on 0.0.0.0:43594 exeption in thread "main" java.lang.numberformatexception: for imput string: "6591 1 at java.lang.integer.parseint(integer.java:456) at java.lang.integer.parseint(integer.java:497) at npchandler.loadnpcdrops(npchandler.java:1536) atnpchandler.<init>(npchandler.java:22) at server.main(server.java:27)
how do i fix this error?

item.title: I need help with an error
item.dc:creator: @c_man123123123 c man123123123
item.description:
@c_man123123123 wrote:

yes. and i did not spam…? , and i have 1 more question if i have 10 of the same npc do i need to make more npc drops or only need one…for examply 10 hans do i need 10 hans codes or just 1?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 06:44:22 PM[/size][hr]hey can some1 help me… … …here what im having truble with :

npc = 1458 Monkey_Archer 86 90

npcdrop = 1458 1 6611 1 1478 1 1704 1 1725 1 1727 1 1729 1 1731 1 3204 1 4087 1 1187 1 1149 1

and when i kill the monkey to test it… it does not drop any of the items…???[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 06:50:47 PM[/size][hr]any1 help me?!? pl0x?

Read full topic

@SFate wrote:

-Off topic: SENIOR MEMBER!

Is your problem fixed Cman?

item.title: I need help with an error
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

[code]//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–

npcdrop = NPC ID 0-5(5 being rarest) ITEMID AMOUNT Dropped[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 06:35:45 PM[/size][hr]-Off topic: SENIOR MEMBER!

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with an error
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

at npchandler.loadnpcdrops(npchandler.java:1536)

It’s in your NpcDrops.cfg folder. Whatever NPC is set to drop 6591, has made your error.

Read full topic
